p: The mean number (± standard deviation) of clinical visits per patient with influenza was 0.97 ± 0.8. Among the patients, 2,661 (79.6%) visited emergency department more than once, and 796 (23.8%) were hospitalized. The median duration of hospitalization was 5 days (range, 1 to 382 days). Eighty-one (2.4%) patients were admitted to an ICU and the median duration of hospitalization in ICU was 6 days (range, 1 to 34 days). Among the patients, 3,043 (91.1%) were treated with antiviral agents: oseltamivir in 2,433 (72.8%), peramivir in 599 (17.9%), and zanamivir in 26 (0.8%).
